item.title: Dissertation
item.description: © 2025, Chuyu Tian TThe aim of my dissertation is to investigate the “why” that grounds Aristotle’s ethical theory. I clarify the meta-ethical status of ethical judgments and investigate the foundation of Aristotle’s ethics. My project takes ethical naturalism as a point of departure. That is, it explores the way in which the foundations of Aristotle’s ethics lie in human nature, especially political nature. In the first chapter, I propose a person-centric account of virtue and virtuous action.
